abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32530456, pmid32530131, pmid32533727, pmid32524373, pmid32533109, pmid32530369, pmid32522874, pmid32530507, pmid32524611, pmid32524537, pmid32524793, pmid32524792, pmid32530738, pmid32532318, pmid32524266, pmid32530929, pmid32530453, pmid32524515, pmid32530505, pmid32530911, pmid32533263, pmid32533621, pmid32533868, pmid32530326, pmid32532802, pmid32531083, pmid32530499, pmid32524839, pmid32530509, pmid32524663, pmid32533777, pmid32533768, pmid32533773, pmid32529795, pmid32530493, pmid32534465, pmid32524893, pmid32533197, pmid32524618, pmid32530534, pmid32534467, pmid32524708, pmid32531808, pmid32533838, pmid32533556, pmid32530597
